at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.fca.db.domainmodel

Class Concept

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.fca.db.DataObject
      • at.tugraz.kmi.medokyservice.fca.db.domainmodel.Concept
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DataObject>

    public class Concept
extends DataObject
    Representation of a formal concept, i.e. a pair of an object set and an attribute set. Contains references to its predecessors, successors and successors wrt. a taxonomy comprising if a subset of a formal context ( Lattice). Furthermore it contains a set referencing all LearnerConcepts based upun this concept in order to propagate updates.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Daniel N. Goetzmann, Bernd Pr√ºnster
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
        Compares the specified object with this concept for equality. Returns true iff the specified object is also a Concept and the object set and the attribute set of this concept are equal to the object set and the attribute set of the other concept, respectively.
        Overrides:
        equals in class DataObject
        Parameters:
        object - the object to be compared for equality with this concept.
        Returns:
        true iff the specified object is equal to this concept.
        See Also:
        Object.equals(Object)

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Returns the hash code value for this concept.

        The hash code value of a Concept is defined as the sum of the hash code values of its object and attribute sets.

        Overrides:
        hashCode in class DataObject
        Returns:
        the hash code value for this concept.

      • updateTaxonomySuccessors

        public void updateTaxonomySuccessors()
        Computes the successors wrt. the taxonomy this concept is part of. This update is also populated to all LearnerConcepts this concept is based upon.
        See Also:
        Lattice
